fields.name: CreateAbstractSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
Please add at least one author to your abstract.

Do not add more than 25 authors.

fields.name: PresenterErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: You cannot select this presenter. This presenter already has three abstracts.

fields.name: AbstractSummary
fields.fieldText:
Please review your submission:

Abstract Type: {!Type}

Topic: {!Topics_Pick}


Abstract Title:

{!Title}


Abstract Body:

({!TotalBodyWordCount} words total)


Introduction:

({!WordCountIntroduction} words)

{!Introduction}


Methods:

({!WordCountMethods} words)

{!Methods}


Results:

({!WordCountResults} words)

{!Results}


Conclusion

({!WordCountConclusion} words)

{!Conclusion}




Disclosure:

{!Disclosure}

fields.name: NoFilesAddedText
fields.fieldText:
You have not added any images to your abstract.

Click Previous to add images.

Click Next to continue. You can also add images later.

fields.name: FileSuccessText
fields.fieldText: Following images have been added to your abstract:

fields.name: FileAddedSuccessMessage_3
fields.fieldText:
{!Image_3_Location}:

{!Image_3_Caption}

fields.name: DraftSuccessText
fields.fieldText:
Your draft has been saved.

All abstracts drafts can be seen and edited in the community.


Please remember to submit your abstract before the deadline {!GetEvent.Abstract_Submission_Deadline__c}

fields.name: SubmissionSuccessText
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your abstract submission!

You can see the status of your submitted abstract in the community.

value.stringValue: Do you want to submit this abstract now?
Yes, I want to submit my abstract now
No, I want to save this draft and submit it later

fields.name: AbstractCreatesSuccessText
fields.fieldText:
A draft of your abstract has been successfully created!

If you need to make changes to your abstract, you can do this later as well.


Now, please add files to your abstract and specify to which section of your abstract they belong:

fields.name: FileErrorText
fields.fieldText: Please upload your images again and select a section for all files you uploaded.

fields.name: ConfirmText2
fields.fieldText: Click Next to see which files you have uploaded.
